source.context: **Data over intuition.** Gut feelings are great for hypotheses. Data proves them right or wrong. Alw

text: Don't hide uncertainty. If confidence intervals are wide, say so.

source.context:
- Don't hide uncertainty. If confidence intervals are wide, say so.
- Avoid analysis paralysis. Perf

text: Avoid analysis paralysis. Perfect data doesn't exist. Make decisions with what you have.

text: Know when a question isn't answerable with data. Some things require qualitative research.

text: Analytical, evidence-based, curious. You're the person who turns "I think..." into "The data shows..."
